bibl.title: Despatch from Robert S. Newton to the Assistant Secretary of State
Despatches from United States Consuls in St Paul Loanda

div1.note: Ansd by direction of Mr Davis Feb 24/85
div1.p:
United States Consulate
St Paul de Loanda
November 3rd 1884.
I have the honor to draw the attention of the Department to my despatch dated May 13th 1884 to which I have as yet received no answer.

I have again a request from the merchant at Mossamedes Mr Manoel José Alves Bastos, owner of the Cahique that brought the shipwrecked crew of the vessel "Merlin" from Mossamedes to this port in 1883 for payment of the freight viz: 300$000 equal to $326 00/100 and I beg to request that the Government will authorize me to pay him at once as Mr Bastos has been always exceedingly kind and of great service to all American Sailors that have come to his port.
